sn35.64:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn35.64:1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.64:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.64:2.1: “Santi kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:2.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.64:2.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.64:2.5: santi ca kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā …pe…
sn35.64:2.6: santi ca kho, migajāla, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:2.7: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.64:2.8: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.64:3.1: Santi ca kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:3.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.64:3.4: santi ca kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā iṭṭhā kantā …pe…
sn35.64:3.5: santi ca kho, migajāla, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:3.6: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.64:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn35.64:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharato nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn35.64:4.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn35.64:4.4: Aññataro ca panāyasmā migajālo arahataṃ ahosīti.
